title: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be displayed even when the dataset is not set.
OB: When a table report item is added without setting the data set, and the user tries to create a new table group, the group dialog is not displayed. Instead, the user is prevented from defining a group.
EB: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be displayed even when the dataset is not set. The user should be able to go ahead and define a group, regardless of whether the dataset is defined or not.
SR:
1. Add a table report item without setting a data set.
2. Try to create a new table group.
3. Observe that the group dialog is not displayed and the user is unable to define a group.
